::Rex::

Rex frowns as Battera puts her hand on his shoulder, the Maximal stopping. He 
looks at her, and then shifts his eyes back ahead of him. His optics were 
sad, the painful memories awakened in his mind.

"I probably should have sent Firearm to escort you. He's much better company 
than me," he resumes walking, wondering if the trigger happy Maximal 
(Firearm) would have opened fire on Battera as soon as he saw her.
